title: New & MPfree: SiairaShawn – Dusk (prod. by Knxwledge)
body:
**[**Knxwledge**](http://gloof.bandcamp.com/)’s** _[Komposure EP](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10367-new-knxwledge-komposure-ep2/ "New: Knxwledge – Komposure.EP")_ remains one of my favorite beat tapes of the year. Its dusty and woozy samples created a haze of sedation, the samples praying on gentle repetition of samples, while subtle changes in the groove jolt the listener out of a forced trance.

His latest track, a production credit on **[SiairaShawn’s](http://www.facebook.com/SiairaShawn)** new cut ‘Dusk’, feels like a spiritual progression of his earlier work. Again, the dusty jazz roots sounds are still prevalent, yet **SiairaShawn’s** smooth and surrendering vocals give the whole thing a much more forward thinking feel. This is more than just crate digging.

Stream and D/L the new track below.

excerpt.full: Knxwledge’s Komposure EP remains one of my favorite beat tapes of the year. Its dusty and woozy samples created a haze of sedation, the samples praying on gentle repetition of samples, while subtle changes in the groove jolt the listener out of a forced trance. His latest track, a production credit on SiairaShawn’s new cut \[…\]
